    • 方法详细资料

      • getTunnelDetTotal

        @RequestMapping(value="tunnels/energies-det/total",
                method=POST)
public com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject getTunnelDetTotal​(@RequestBody
                                                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> map)
        获取指定时间段内各类能耗总和
        参数:
        id - 管廊id，必须
        startTime - 开始时间（时间戳）可选
        endTime - 结束时间（时间戳） 可选
        返回:
        {"msg":"请求成功","code":"200","data":{"val":18.83,"key":"总能耗"}}

      • getTunnelDetRatio

        @RequestMapping(value="tunnels/energies-det/ratio",
                method=POST)
public com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject getTunnelDetRatio​(@RequestBody
                                                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> map)
        获取指定时间段内各类能耗占比
        参数:
        id - 管廊id，必须
        startTime - 开始时间（时间戳）可选
        endTime - 结束时间（时间戳） 可选
        返回:
        {"msg":"请求成功","code":"200","data":[{"val":0.0,"key":"风机类电表"},{"val":15.83,"key":"灯类电表"},{"val":3.0,"key":"水泵类电表"},{"val":0,"key":"其他类电表"}]}

      • getDetRatioAndTotal

        @RequestMapping(value="energies-det/ratio/total",
                method=POST)
public com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject getDetRatioAndTotal​(@RequestBody(required=false)
                                                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> map)
        获取指定时间段内，各管廊下的各类能耗总和与占比
        参数:
        map -
        返回:

      • getTunnelDet

        @RequestMapping(value="tunnels/{id}/energies-det/{value}",
                method=GET)
public com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject getTunnelDet​(@PathVariable("id")
                                                    java.lang.Integer id,
                                                    @PathVariable("value")
                                                    java.lang.Integer value)
        按照指定周期显示各类能耗使用曲线图
        参数:
        id - 管廊id
        value - 日期枚举
        返回:
        {"msg":"请求成功","code":"200","data":[{"val":[{"val":0.0,"key":"1月"},{"val":0.0,"key":"2月"},{"val":0.0,"key":"3月"},{"val":0.0,"key":"4月"},{"val":0.0,"key":"5月"},{"val":0.0,"key":"6月"},{"val":0.0,"key":"7月"},{"val":12744.9,"key":"8月"}],"key":"风机类电表"},{"val":[{"val":0.0,"key":"1月"},{"val":0.0,"key":"2月"},{"val":0.0,"key":"3月"},{"val":0.0,"key":"4月"},{"val":0.0,"key":"5月"},{"val":0.0,"key":"6月"},{"val":0.0,"key":"7月"},{"val":5469.3,"key":"8月"}],"key":"灯类电表"},{"val":[{"val":0.0,"key":"1月"},{"val":0.0,"key":"2月"},{"val":0.0,"key":"3月"},{"val":0.0,"key":"4月"},{"val":0.0,"key":"5月"},{"val":0.0,"key":"6月"},{"val":0.0,"key":"7月"},{"val":1816.2,"key":"8月"}],"key":"水泵类电表"},{"val":[{"val":0.0,"key":"1月"},{"val":0.0,"key":"2月"},{"val":0.0,"key":"3月"},{"val":0.0,"key":"4月"},{"val":0.0,"key":"5月"},{"val":0.0,"key":"6月"},{"val":0.0,"key":"7月"},{"val":7280.1,"key":"8月"}],"key":"其他类电表"}]}

      • getTunnelEnergyByTimeType

        @RequestMapping(value="/tunnels/energies/timetype/{value}",
                method=GET)
public com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject getTunnelEnergyByTimeType​(@PathVariable
                                                                 java.lang.Integer value)
        参数:
        value - 1 : 历史总能耗 2 : 年度能耗 3: 月度能耗 4: 本周能耗
